banner_subtitle: Discover the art of relaxation in the heart of Cox's Bazar.
feature_desc1: Nestled along the world's longest natural sea beach, our hotel offers a haven of relaxation and luxury. With 5-star amenities and impeccable service, we redefine the art of hospitality.
feature_desc2: We believe that a memorable stay begins with a delectable culinary experience. Our in-house restaurant is not just a dining venue; it's a gateway to a world of exquisite flavors.
feature_desc3.1: Experience the epitome of romance in our Honeymoon Suite Room. Immerse yourself in a world of love and luxury, with a private balcony, stunning sea views, and all the amenities to create cherished memories with your special someone.
feature_desc3.2: Our Super Deluxe Couple Room is designed for those seeking a cozy, intimate escape. Enjoy the comfort of a spacious room, a king-sized bed, and all the essential amenities for a perfect couple's retreat by the sea.
feature_desc3.3: Our Family Deluxe Room is the ideal choice for space and comfort. With ample room to accommodate your loved ones, this room features modern conveniences, including a separate living area, ensuring everyone enjoys a wonderful stay by the beach.
pricing_subtitle: The best value designed for your workplace, starting at just $24/user/month.
faq_subtitle: Have a question? Check out our frequently asked questions to find your answer.
